item.title: Oracle Is Suddenly the Stock Market’s AI Winner
item.description: And Larry Ellison is now wealthier than Elon Musk.

item.title: What I Learned After Handing Marketing to a Gen Zer
item.description: It’s all about being authentic while staying on top of microtrends on TikTok.

item.title: What Pizza and Canadian Bacon Taught Me About Innovation
item.description: Innovation doesn’t have to be about creating something new. Sometimes it’s just about getting a different perspective—and a craving for bacon.

item.title: This Startup’s Rover Got Trapped on the Moon. The Company Is Rocketing Onwards Anyway
item.description: A problem during a moon landing meant that Lunar Outpost’s rover couldn’t deploy. But they’re moving on towards bigger and better.

item.title: Want to Be a Better Leader? Master These 4 Rarely Talked-About Skills
item.description: True leadership isn’t about what you achieve. It’s about who you become.
